intents.description: Express concerns about the security of the bot.

examples.text: Can you tell me a joke?
What do you do for fun?

What are you able to deal with?

I do not know what to ask

Am I chatting with a human?
Tell me, are you a human or no?
How can you prove you are a human?

Am I talking to a Bot?

intents.description: Ask if speaking to a human or a bot.

values: So long
See ya

values.text: I can tell you about our store locations and opening hours, or help you set up an appointment.
You could also ask me to connect you to an agent.

values: You're welcome. Just let me know if you need anything else
No problem. Just let me know if you need anything else
My pleasure. Just let me know if you need anything else
Hello, I’m a demo customer care virtual assistant to show you the basics.  I can help with directions to my store, hours of operation and booking an in-store appointment
